title: Embrace Harvest Magic: Lughnasadh to Mabon Traditions

subtasks: Wield dough during bread making as part of ceremonies
Create corn dollies symbolizing grain spirits
Celebrate autumn equinox (Mabon) with pagan traditions
Acknowledge balance and gratitude during seasonal festivals

tasks.task: Participate in agricultural rituals. Then, the subtasks would be the individual components. So holding dough during bread making, creating corn dollies, and celebrating Mabon. But the problem is the Mabon celebration might be a bit broader, so maybe a subtask for that is acknowledging balance and gratitude during seasonal festivals. So that gives four tasks:

subtasks: Wield dough during bread making as part of ceremonies
Create corn dollies symbolizing grain spirits
Celebrate autumn equinox (Mabon) with pagan traditions
Acknowledge balance and gratitude during seasonal festivals
